reviewText: fun to watch those old movies again and show them to our kids

I bought this to introduce children to the Our Gang and Laurel & Hardy -- in this regard except for the Our Gang (Little Rascals) it fails. This DVD is designed to mis-lead buyers. The Our Gang films are fine. The "Laurel & Hardy" implies you will see them both in their personas; but almost all the work is pre- their partnership, one in which Stan merely directs and one in which I could see no connection to L&H whatsoever. That said, it does contain there last film -- Atoll K / Utopia (1951) Laurel & Hardy / Our Gang 4-DVD Set
